events.name: Marriage
events.short_description: Crafting memorable weddings with personalized themes, stunning decor, and seamless planning. We ensure every moment of your big day is cherished forever.

events.name: Thread cerimony
events.short_description: Honoring traditions with thoughtful arrangements and culturally inspired setups. Celebrate this sacred milestone with elegance and care.

events.name: Corporate Events
events.short_description: Delivering professional and impactful corporate events, from conferences to product launches. We handle every detail to impress your guests and achieve your goals.

events.name: Birthday
events.short_description: Turning birthdays into unforgettable celebrations with unique themes and fun-filled activities. Make every milestone magical and joyful.

events.name: Aniversary
events.short_description: Celebrate love and togetherness with intimate and grand anniversary parties. We create heartwarming experiences to cherish your journey together.

events.name: Bachlore Party
events.short_description: Plan the ultimate send-off with thrilling bachelor or bachelorette parties. From wild adventures to classy affairs, we make it unforgettable.

events.name: Private Party
events.short_description: Host exclusive gatherings with personalized touches and seamless execution. We bring your vision to life for any intimate occasion.
